title: New: i am runnings in circles – full moon (Demo)
content:
Sadness is the key to all great music, right? With i am running in circles’ biography stating ‘I got sad and made music’, it’s clear that he agrees with this notion.

For a track recorded on a tape recorder and then pieced together in Garage Band, full moon is a devilishly ambitious composition. So it owes much to The Microphones in its opening exchanges, before blossoming into a gorgeous, Sigur Ros-esque number, yet Eli Smith (aka i am running in circles) injects his own, heavy hearted sense of honesty and frailty.

‘now i’m sprawled across my bedroom floor / while the sound of the wind in the trees reverberates / haunting me’
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
